text: Norodom Sirividuh (; born 8 June 1951) is a Cambodia royal politician who served as Minister of Foreign Affairs from 1993 to 1994. A member of the royalist FUNCINPEC, he also served as Deputy Prime Minister from 2004 to 2006, and, concurrently, co-Minister of Interior with Sar Kheng. He is the son of King Norodom Suramarit, and a half-brother of King Father Norodom Sihanouk. ==Honours== *60px Friendship Order (Vietnam, 2005) *60px Grand Cordon of the Order of the Rising Sun (Japan, 2019) ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Cambodian expatriates in France Category:Cambodian princes Category:Foreign ministers of Cambodia Category:FUNCINPEC politicians Category:House of Norodom Category:Interior ministers of Cambodia Category:Living people Category:Paris Dauphine University alumni Category:People from Phnom Penh Category:Grand Cordons of the Order of the Rising Sun Category:Recipients of the Friendship Order
title: Norodom Sirivudh
